net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_searchJsonObject
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Performs searches against a JSON object as would json.path.read does. Takes a JSON argument:
arg(0) = { "object": "toon", "property": "fixedValue", "subType": "ability-checks", "type": "expertise" }
Within the JSON, the "object" parameter is required. It can be a full character JSON or a sub-section.
"property" is a reserved parameter that indicates the values to return. If "property" is not provided, the full entity is returned for each match.
All other key-value pairs are used as search terms.
Note: dndb_searchJsonObject must be available to call as an untrusted macro.
